name: WorldZ
description:
WorldZ is a singleplayer wave based Zombie FPS shooter game that everyone can play for free! The very first Beta 1.0 contains some informations at the main menu after you downloaded the game. The controls are very simple, and the waves are completely endless! More levels are coming soon, or not so soon...

Controls: -W, S, A, D to move around, LMB to shoot, B to open inventory, P to pause
